content: Look! The Great Obstructionist Party came up with a budget. Okay, it is more of an outline of a budget. Maybe more of an invitation to a budget. The only actual numbers in it are the page numbers. Just four or five days ago he of too much bronzer, John Boehner called Timothy Geithner's proposal for Congress to pass legislation allowing the federal government to take over failing non-bank financial institutions "an unprecedented grab of power." And what did Boehner (how is that pronounced? When two vowels go walking…) put into his “Prelude to a Budget”? Well gosh, lookie here…they proposed giving the federal government authority to take over financial institutions. GOP Budget This is a .gov link They DID try really hard though…and someone was able to use shapes! That ought to raise your approval rating!

title: Hey! The GOP got themselves a budget! Well, not really but...

content: Its easy to create a budget when all you do is walk into a stroe and say: total it up! Then drop your "Citizen's card" on the desk and say: They'll cover it. It would have been a real attempt at leadership if Obama HAD actually attempted to create a budget: You know sitting down and figuring out how much money he had to spend and then attempting to fund his projects with it.. Instead he just opened up a vein in the heart of America and will let it flow until we bleed dry. In a very real sense, Obama doesn't have a budget either.

content: It's too bad the republicans had to get an ass-whippin' during the recent elections to come up with what they purport to be a sensible plan to reduce spending, cut the deficit, and eliminate government waste. They should try this approach when they are in power, but as the saying goes, power corrupts, and absolute power corrupts absolutely. We are witnessing the beginning effects with the new Obama Administration and we've seen the results with the democrats who now control congress. "The World's Finest"

content: quote: Originally posted by SeaWitch1220: Look! The Great Obstructionist Party came up with a budget. Okay, it is more of an outline of a budget. Maybe more of an invitation to a budget. The only actual numbers in it are the page numbers. Only the page numbers? I guess you didn't read much into it. There are some other things I would like to see in there, as well as more details. It sure seems better than the crap the Obama administration has been throwing around. Where was the line by line review, accountability and so on? People speak out about Bush's spending (many of us have spoken out), but yet are quiet when Obama is spending at record amounts. Oh, but it's all OK now, because Obama is signing for the spending. The blame goes around to many people, both Democrat and Republican. The Dem's and Repubs who signed porkulus with over 8,000 earmarks should be ashamed of themselves. Those who support Cap and Trade, the GWPRA, and carbon taxes, should as well be ashamed. So I guess you support the GWPRA, Carbon Taxes, and the Cap and trade scam? That will fix everything . People that have never generated an ounce of steam, or Watt of electricity are coming up with these scams. Many of these same folks are put in charge, whether it be a cabinet position, within the EPA, or just the writing of legislation. The fact that any of those ill equipped, ill informed folks are allowed to make decisions and draft policy is beyond me. When you refer to the great obstructionist party....are you talking about many Democrats, and their obstruction of further drilling and exploration? Pelosi and others have nerve saying anything about "failed energy policy". Ever been to the UAE Sea Witch? In 2006 their GDP grew by 35%. Oh the evil oil companies over here don't deserve to expand, create more jobs, and make us less dependent on imported oil. Those evil greedy Americans don't deserve any more wealth. Let's just keep it overseas. You talk of obstructionist policies? You need to know where to look. How can Obama talk about growing our economy, creating more jobs, and his famous "tax cuts for 95% of Americans" when he supports Cap and Trade along with energy taxes to boot ? Their energy taxes and cap and trade scams will be an increase on 100% of Americans. There was one thing that was most effective by way of environmental control's, and bettering the environment. Can you guess what that was? I'll give you a hint. It has been more effective and successful than Al Gore, the IPCC, the UN, and even the alarmists. It also has been and will be more effective than any scam they have on the drawing board. It has actually produced results, instead of hot air. You have people here calling the Republicans and some Democrats obstructionists, and they should, as one poster said in another thread "shut up and let Obama do what he wants". I'm glad some of these elected officials are obstructing policy that will lead us to disaster, rather than help. I am glad they are getting in the way of Cap and Trade, carbon taxes and the other scams they are throwing around. Many have woken up, and it's about damn time. Maybe some Democrats will run against Polosi, Dodd, Reid, and Frank. If not, I do hope there will be someone to put up a challenge. There are many others that need to be voted out on both sides as well.
